message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you wanting a larger share Alice, but it needs to be more equitable. This offer gives us both a reasonable amount.
Bob, this is a better deal than your last. Time is running out, and the value decreases with every round.
